name: Edu Testimonials
author: Hany Mahrous

sections.description:
EDU Testimonials is a standalone plugin built, maintained & operated by the friendly folks over at EDU Academy Theme

In just a few steps, you will be collecting and publishing your testimonials or reviews.
Beginners and pros alike will appreciate the wealth of flexible features refined over 4 years from user feedback and requests.

Primary Features
* Very easy to use just copy this shortcode [testimonials-slider]
* A front-end Slider
* Custom fields
* Featured Images (thumbnails)
* Developer-friendly (actions, filters, templates)
* SEO friendly testimonials
* This plugin is totally free
sections.installation:
Go to Plugins > Add New.
Search for “edu testimonials”.
Click “Install Now”.
OR

Download the zip file.
Upload the zip file via Plugins > Add New > Upload.
Activate the plugin. Look for “Testimonials” in the admin menu.
sections.faq:
What is the shortcode?

use this shortcode:

[testimonials-slider]

To display your testimonials as a slideshow.

Can I show more than one testimonials slider?

Yes. you can show 1, 2 or more testimonials slider.

Will it automatically use my existing testimonials?

No. If you already have testimonials in another plugin or theme, you will have to re-enter them. Why? Because every theme and plugin stores data differently.
